page.title: 19Recreation in the area.
page.content: Both children and adults participate in sport,go dancing, sail,fish and belong to social clubs. Horse-riding is a very popular activity, since many establishments around Belfairs keep horses. Children may attend the"Music School" at Hadleigh Jun. which provides private tuition for pupils outside normal school hours. There is also the "Hadleigh Marching Militaire",a self-supporting{show band started by John Willson to provide an activity and interest for local children. The musicians accompany a 'colour guard'of girls as they perform their routines. Fees from their shows pay for uniforms and instruments,they also perform for Charity.Some of the musicians continue with music at the Royal School of Music or in the Armed Forces.
